# TreeSelectionFunc delegate

```csharp
public delegate bool TreeSelectionFunc(IntPtr selection, IntPtr model, IntPtr path, 
    bool path_currently_selected, IntPtr data);
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| selection | Transfer ownership: none |
| model | Transfer ownership: none |
| path | Transfer ownership: none |
| path_currently_selected | Transfer ownership: none |
| data | Transfer ownership: none; Nullable: true |

## Return Value

Transfer ownership: none
